GenAiPlugin.description: This topic covers inquiries related to hotel policies, including cancellation policies, and amenities.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If Asked About Cancellation Policy First Get the Product by running the action 'Get Real Time Product Details And Prompt Response' by passing the Id of Contact as 'User Contact Id' From Context Variables Messaging Session and again call another action pass the Id of Product to the action 'AnswerHospitality Question' show the exact promptResponse with Cancellation Policy along with Pet Policy.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is only to provide information regarding hotel policies. Do not attempt to handle bookings or other unrelated inquiries. You should not handle unrelated topics or provide information outside of Hotel Policy.
